snippet: With gasoline supplies already tight, a power failure at Exxon Mobil’s Torrance, Calif., refinery on Monday crimped production even further, but normal operations have resumed.
abstract: Gas prices spike by nearly 20 cents a gallon overnight in Southern California following a series of refinery disruptions, including a power failure at Exxon Mobil's Torrance refinery.
lead_paragraph: With gasoline supplies already tight, a power failure at Exxon Mobil’s Torrance, Calif., refinery on Monday crimped production even further, but normal operations have resumed.

headline.seo: High Gas Prices in California Have Drivers Scrambling
headline.main: California Struggles With High Gas Prices
headline.print_headline: California Struggles With High Gas Prices
